PriceTableItem.title: Price Table Item
PriceTableItem.description: Represents a single service and its price in the price table.

description.description: A detailed description of the service.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the item.

OrderItem.title: Order Item
OrderItem.description: Represents a single item within a customer's order.

serviceType.description: The type of service for this item.

value.description: The value of this specific item.

assignedTo.description: The professional assigned to work on this item.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer's order, containing multiple items.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer who placed the order.

customerName.description: The name of the customer (denormalized for display).

totalValue.description: The total value of the order (sum of all items).

dueDate.description: The due date for the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the order.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the order.

materialsUsed.description: A list of materials from the inventory used in this order.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer of the atelier.

name.description: The full name of the customer.

phone.description: The phone number of the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the customer record.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the customer.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, including their activation status.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

status.description: The activation status of the user's account.

expiresAt.description: The date when the user's subscription expires.

trialStarted.description: Flag indicating if the user has started their free trial.

passwordHash.description: The hash of the user's privacy mode password.

AccessToken.title: Access Token
AccessToken.description: Represents a one-time activation code for user subscriptions.

duration.description: The duration of the subscription in months (e.g., 3, 6, 12).

isUsed.description: Flag indicating if the token has been used.

usedBy.description: The UID of the user who redeemed the token.

usedAt.description: The timestamp when the token was used.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the token was created.

Suggestion.title: Suggestion
Suggestion.description: Represents a user-submitted suggestion or feedback.

userId.description: The ID of the user who submitted the suggestion.

userName.description: The name of the user who submitted the suggestion.

userEmail.description: The email of the user who submitted the suggestion.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the suggestion was created.

Material.title: Material
Material.description: Represents a single material in the inventory.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this material.

usedInOrders.description: Counter for how many orders this material has been used in.

Purchase.title: Purchase
Purchase.description: Represents a record of a material purchase.

materialName.description: The name of the material purchased.

cost.description: The total cost of the purchase.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the quantity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the purchase.

FixedCost.title: Fixed Cost
FixedCost.description: Represents a fixed or operational cost, like rent or utilities.

description.description: A description of the cost (e.g., 'Aluguel do Ateliê', 'Conta de Luz').

date.description: The date the cost was incurred or paid.

userId.description: The ID of the user who recorded the cost.

UserSummary.title: User Summary
UserSummary.description: Stores aggregated data for a user's dashboard.

totalRevenue.description: The total revenue from all completed orders.

totalOrders.description: The total number of orders created.

pendingOrders.description: The number of orders currently in 'Novo' or 'Em Processo' status.

monthlyRevenue.description: A map of monthly revenue, with keys in 'YYYY-MM' format.

monthlyCosts.description: A map of monthly costs from purchases, with keys in 'YYYY-MM' format.

userId.description: The ID of the user this summary belongs to.

/priceTable/{itemId}.description: Stores items for the price table.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including activation status.

/purchases/{purchaseId}.description: Stores records of material purchases for cost analysis.

/fixedCosts/{costId}.description: Stores records of fixed and operational costs.

/summaries/{summaryId}.description: Stores aggregated dashboard data for each user.
